parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: IsDefend
parameters.description:
Specifies whether an attack is defended. Valid values:

*   0: detected
*   1: blocked

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description:
The risk levels. The value is a JSON array. Valid values:

*   serious: high
*   suspicious: medium
*   remind: low

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data management center of the threat analysis feature resides. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the member in the resource directory.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view.

*   0: view of the current Alibaba Cloud account.
*   1: view of all accounts for the enterprise.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The data source of the alert.

parameters.name: SubUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the account within which the alert is generated.
